type1.max_order_amount_restriction_note:
Any option checked means it is disabled, for example:
Amount=20 Euro
Delivery type= pickup (checked)
Payment mode= card (checked)
Then on the checkout page, once the cart amount is 20 pickup delivery type is disabled, and from Payment mode card option is disabled.
